analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko nahetu dhammo
analyzed: saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam hetum dhammam paṭicca na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ na hetu dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke aṭṭha
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke aṭṭha

original: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke cha pe avigate nava
